explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the integration of machine learning with econometric methods in the development of hybrid ML-HAR-RV models.
explanations.regression: The HAR-RV model mentioned in the paper is a type of regression model used for forecasting volatility.
explanations.neural network: Given the use of machine learning in the hybrid models, neural networks could be part of the techniques employed, though not explicitly mentioned.
explanations.deep learning: Deep learning techniques might be used within the machine learning component of the hybrid models, though not explicitly specified.
